repairedDockerfile:
FROM hub.c.163.com/netease_comb/centos:7
MAINTAINER xiaoyi

# 更新yum源
RUN yum makecache fast && yum -y update glibc   

# 安装常用软件
RUN yum install -y openssh-server vim tar wget curl rsync bzip2 iptables tcpdump less telnet net-tools lsof && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install epel-release && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install python-pip && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install git && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install gcc && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
#RUN yum -y install gcc-c++
RUN yum -y install python-devel && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install make automake && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum -y install redis && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN yum clean all

RUN mkdir -p /data/www/query_analysis
RUN mkdir -p /data/logs
ADD . /data/www/query_analysis

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir supervisor
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir tornado
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir redis
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir PyYAML
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir regex

WORKDIR /data/www/query_analysis
ENTRYPOINT ["supervisord", "-n", "-c", "supervisord_docker.conf"]
